channel.title: A revolutionizing breakthrough......
channel.description:
I was just thinking about the mod and something came up in my mind: This mod will be special and unique in terms of creation, detail and length, and will mostly surpass any other existing mod. Ive never heard of another mod that huge like this one, and with huge i mean:
- the team worked over 5 years on this one - Looking at the original Half Life, this mod has a very long play-time as well - the love, detail and dedication for this mod is stunning - everything is professionally done, from voice acting to level design...
I dont remember any other mod you can compare to Black mesa, so this will be definitely a breakthrough in the modding scene!

item.title: A revolutionizing breakthrough......
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Holy shit it’s like a dog-whistle.

Read full topic

item.title: A revolutionizing breakthrough......
item.dc:creator: LonePaladin
item.description:
I’ve been following this forum for about a year now, myself, though I almost never post anywhere except the occasional off-topic thread. I guess I want to see how long I can go with a miniscule post-count. Or something like that.

While I see a pretty regular procession of Typical Internet Dickery, what keeps me coming back is the really twisted sense of humor (and irony) that turns up all the time. I’ve lost count of how many memes I’ve been exposed to just from reading the Laugh You Lose thread (which I check daily).

You get enough people in any public spot online and you’re going to see some jackassery. I’ve been online way too long to take serious offense at it. I just apply a grain of salt, imagine the person posting that sort of tripe as doing so while wearing a bear-suit (which makes it even funnier), and move on.

Oh, and to test Verde Flash’s theory:

Masturbation.

Let’s see if it works.

Read full topic

item.title: A revolutionizing breakthrough......
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Xenomorphlover:

I was just thinking about the mod and something came up in my mind:
This mod will be special and unique in terms of creation, detail and length, and will mostly surpass any other existing mod.
Ive never heard of another mod that huge like this one, and with huge i mean:

  • the team worked over 5 years on this one
  • Looking at the original Half Life, this mod has a very long play-time as well
  • the love, detail and dedication for this mod is stunning
  • everything is professionally done, from voice acting to level design…

I dont remember any other mod you can compare to Black mesa, so this will be definitely a breakthrough in the modding scene!

First person Terminator Gears of War mod.

I’m not just saying that because I’m working on it (kinda) either.

This doesn not change the fact that BMS is fucking awesome.

Medevilae:

The forums are very nice, if you can take overwhelming deadpan humor and overuse of sarcasm, which anyone in their right minds should be able to.

…Understand…

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: A revolutionizing breakthrough......
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Black Op:

Giving n00bs mutual respect is a waste of time, since all they ever do is spit in your face while suggesting stupid ideas or performing other acts of idiocy. N00bs, therefore, must be expunged. They must be fought tooth and nail, and that fight happens on these very forums.

For the time being faelnor, prepare to take a vacation to the Ministry of Love…

I have to disagree with you there. Waffle is a great example of a good noob. I have yet to see him post something uninteligent, and he’s a new arrival to the forums.
Also, I shall destroy your puny thought police!

Read full topic

Hell, this is one of the most heavily moderated boards I’ve ever seen, and I have been a member of the PA boards for years.

item.title: A revolutionizing breakthrough......
item.dc:creator: Langenscheiss
item.description:
Raminator:

So what you’re saying is that it’s exactly like masturbation.

to me it seems like you have some kind of live forum activity monitor which links you to a thread everytime it finds awesome words like “masturbation” or “George Washington” etc, because I really wasn’t surprised to see you commenting after Skaevola’s and aws’ post

But yeah, I did say this elsewhere, but I would gladly repeat that it’s just that such big hobby projects as BM are rarely seen in the games world, which makes it really outstanding.

Read full topic

item.title: A revolutionizing breakthrough......
item.dc:creator: faelnor
item.description:
@Deathmonkey7 :

Not really, he didn’t say retards, he said assholes and while the “just ban me already” drama is a fine example of not having the balls to support his own point of view, I tend to agree with him minus the gratuitous jab at the devs. There seems to be a general agreement that no mutual respect is required here and while hilarious moments may stem from this from time to time, the ugly generally far outweighs the sheer beauty of lol.

Especially for people used to adult and reasonably caustic forums. Most people here have a long way to go, and as the bastard child of steam forums / 4chan pseudo-superiority vent for teenagers / modding scene (see Venn diagram), these forums were bound to be on the rather far side of maturity and respect. Still, the amounts of 4channery and memedropping here are beyond ridiculous.

Read full topic

item.title: A revolutionizing breakthrough......
item.dc:creator: Deimos
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

I’ve been a member of the Black Mesa Forums for almost as year, and there’s rarely been a dull moment! Everyone has a personality, rather than just a collection of soulless fat basement dwellers wasting their life away in front of the monitor. It’s like an uncensored television sitcom! I mean, what other forum community can inspire their own comic?

Because there’s Australians here, we rock B)

Read full topic
